name: 量子力學（一）
description: 主要在介紹量子力學的基本原理、觀念、計算方法和應用，以作為進一步從事物理研究的準備。
goals: 瞭解量子力學的發展及理論
syllabus:
​

1\. Introduction:

    A. Mathematical Introduction

    B. Review of Classical Mechanics

C. Problems with Classical Mechanics

D. The Postulates

2\. Quantum Mechanics in One Dimension

    A. Simple Problems in One Dimension

   B. The Classical Limit

   C. The Harmonic Oscillator

3\. The Path Integral Formulation of Quantum Theory

4\. The Heisenberg Uncertainty Relation

5\. Symmetries

   A. Systems with N Degrees of Freedom

   B. Symmetries and Their Consequences

C. Rotational Invariance and Angular Momentum

6\. The Hydrogen Atom
